mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_ROLE(USER_ROLE_ID, U_ID, R_ID) VALUES (#{userRoleId},#{uid},#{rid})
INSERT INTO USER_TOKEN(USER_TOKEN_ID, U_ID, T_ID) VALUES (#{userTokenId},#{uid},#{token})

select U.USER_ID,U.USER_NAME,U.USER_TEL,U.USER_IMG,U.USER_INTRODUCE from USER U where 1=1 AND U.USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.update: update USER SET USER_IMG=#{userImg} WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.*, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER U WHERE U.USER_ID = #{ownerId})AS OWNER_NAME, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER U WHERE U.USER_ID = #{targetId})AS TARGET_NAME FROM ATTENTION A,USER U WHERE 1=1 AND A.OWNER_ID = #{ownerId} AND A.TARGET_ID = #{targetId} AND A.IS_DELETE = '2'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENTION(ATTENTION_ID, OWNER_ID, TARGET_ID, CREATE_DATE, IS_DELETE) VALUES (#{attentionId},#{ownerId},#{targetId},#{createDate},#{isDelete})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.*, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER U WHERE U.USER_ID = A.OWNER_ID)AS OWNER_NAME, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER U WHERE U.USER_ID = A.TARGET_ID)AS TARGET_NAME FROM ATTENTION A,USER U WHERE 1=1 AND A.ATTENTION_ID = #{attentionId} AND A.IS_DELETE = '2'

SELECT DISTINCT A.*, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER U WHERE U.USER_ID = A.OWNER_ID)AS OWNER_NAME, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER U WHERE U.USER_ID = A.TARGET_ID)AS TARGET_NAME FROM ATTENTION A,USER U WHERE 1=1 AND A.OWNER_ID = #{ownerId} AND A.IS_DELETE = '2' ORDER BY A.CREATE_DATE DESC limit #{start},#{end}
SELECT U.* FROM USER U WHERE 1=1 AND U.USER_ENABLED = '1'
